Buy 3 Get 1 FREE — This Week Only

Add 4 lights to your cart use code BUY3GET1 in checkout, and the 4th item will be free! With no limit to the number of free items you can get, this is fantastic opportunity to upgrade your lighting. Want 2 free? Add 8 lights to your cart—mix and match any of the lights you want below. Want 3 free? Put a total quantity of 12 in your cart. The discount will be applied to the lowest-price qualifying items first. Happy savings!

Offer good toward in-stock (no pre-order) items only. Only lights on this page qualify. You can mix & match lights from this page. Offer valid Monday, August 22 – Sunday, August 28, while supplies last.
